Name: Arosia
About the game: Conquer the World! Let your strategy skills talks, weaken your opponents, and break a leg to get the best luck! Occupy resources to build the strongest country much faster. Build Castles, Armies, Factories, and Embassies to greater your power and defense your country. Arosia blends strategy with luck but does this with a well-balanced system. Take risks, use your tactics, and try to win. Arosia inspired from a non-named basic paper game that creators played in High Scool. You'll have square lands, you'll attack enemies to get more lands and don't stop until the World is yours! Arosia allows you to play with your friends, also you can play with bots individually. You can pass your computer to a near-by friend or in the future, you can play in multiplayer with your Steam friends (estimation).
